segments.text: I notice the boy on the unstable stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, yet I can see the stool wobbling beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The consequences could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body stretches with all its might, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands by, looking up at him with an eager expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can sense the thrill of their secret cookie heist, but it's so risky!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like a ticking time bomb, waiting for something to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
